
  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__content {
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__header {
    padding: 24px 16px;
    border: none;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__icon {
    display: none;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__title {
    font-family: Lato, sans-serif;
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-style: normal;
    line-height: 28px;
    color: #152242;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__types {
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types {
    margin-top: 0;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types__type {
    margin-left: 0;
    width: 33%;
    color: #737a8e;
    opacity: 1;
    border-radius: 2px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: 16px 16px;
    background-position: center;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types__type_auto {
    background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types__type_masstransit {
    background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types__type_pedestrian {
    background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-types__type_selected {
    background-color: #f3f6ff;
    border-radius: 2px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__input {
    margin-left: calc(24px + 8px);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__input_from {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input {
    border-radius: 2px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #ced1d7;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #152242;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input.ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input_disabled {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input input {
    font-size: 14px;
    border-left-width: 8px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input.ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input_focused {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(4, 104, 255, 1);
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_first,
  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_last {
    left: calc(-24px - 8px);
    top: calc(50% - 24px / 2);
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_first svg,
  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_last svg {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_first svg circle,
  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_last svg circle {
    r: 12px;
    cx: 12px;
    cy: 12px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_first svg circle {
    fill: #ff1f34;
    color: #ff1f34;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_last svg circle {
    fill: #0468ff;
    color: #0468ff;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_first svg text,
  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel-input__icon_last svg text {
    font-size: 14px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__clear-row {
    margin: 12px 0 6px;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__clear {
    font-family: Lato, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    line-height: 20px;
    color: #0468ff;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control .ymaps-2-1-79-route-panel__clear:hover {
    color: #0661ec;
  }

  
  .ya-custom-route-control_sticky-left .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__content {
    background: white;
    border-width: 1px 0 0 1px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-color: #e8e9eC;
    border-radius: 0 0 4px 0;
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control_sticky-left .ymaps-2-1-79-popup {
    padding: 0;
  }


  
  .ya-custom-route-control_sticky-bottom .ymaps-2-1-79-popup {
    padding: 0;
    max-width: 100% !important;
  }

  .ya-custom-route-control_sticky-bottom .ymaps-2-1-79-control-popup__content {
    padding-bottom: 36px;
  }

 
  .ymaps-2-1-79-search__suggest {
    top: auto !important;
    bottom: 30px;
  }
